Translations.Text: waʿindahum qasiratu l-tarfi atrabun
hadha ma tuʿaduna liyawmi l-hisabi
inna hadha lariz'quna ma lahu min nafadin
hadha wa-inna lilttaghina lasharra maabin
jahannama yaslawnaha fabi'sa l-mihadu
hadha falyadhuquhu hamimun waghassaqun
waakharu min shaklihi azwajun
hadha fawjun muq'tahimun maʿakum la marhaban bihim innahum salu l-nari
qalu bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumuhu lana fabi'sa l-qararu
qalu rabbana man qaddama lana hadha fazid'hu ʿadhaban diʿ'fan fi l-nari
waqalu ma lana la nara rijalan kunna naʿudduhum mina l-ashrari
attakhadhnahum sikh'riyyan am zaghat ʿanhumu l-absaru
inna dhalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli l-nari
qul innama ana mundhirun wama min ilahin illa l-lahu l-wahidu l-qaharu
rabbu l-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma l-ʿazizu l-ghafaru
qul huwa naba-on ʿazimun
antum ʿanhu muʿ'riduna
ma kana liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i l-aʿla idh yakhtasimuna
in yuha ilayya illa annama ana nadhirun mubinun
idh qala rabbuka lil'malaikati inni khaliqun basharan min tinin
fa-idha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fihi min ruhi faqaʿu lahu sajidina
fasajada l-malaikatu kulluhum ajmaʿuna
illa ib'lisa is'takbara wakana mina l-kafirina
qala yaib'lisu ma manaʿaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina l-ʿalina
qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
qala fa-ukh'ruj min'ha fa-innaka rajimun
wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnati ila yawmi l-dini
qala rabbi fa-anzir'ni ila yawmi yub'ʿathuna
qala fa-innaka mina l-munzarina
ila yawmi l-waqti l-maʿlumi
qala fabiʿizzatika la-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿina
illa ʿibadaka min'humu l-mukh'lasina
qala fal-haqu wal-haqa aqulu
la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿina
qul ma asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wama ana mina l-mutakalifina
in huwa illa dhik'run lil'ʿalamina
walataʿlamunna naba-ahu baʿda hinin
tanzilu l-kitabi mina l-lahi l-ʿazizi l-hakimi
inna anzalna ilayka l-kitaba bil-haqi fa-uʿ'budi l-laha mukh'lisan lahu l-dina

ala lillahi l-dinu l-khalisu wa-alladhina ittakhadhu min dunihi awliyaa ma naʿbuduhum illa liyuqarribuna ila l-lahi zul'fa inna l-laha yahkumu baynahum fi ma hum fihi yakhtalifuna inna l-laha la yahdi man huwa kadhibun kaffarun
law arada l-lahu an yattakhidha waladan la-is'tafa mimma yakhluqu ma yashau sub'hanahu huwa l-lahu l-wahidu l-qaharu
khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi yukawwiru al-layla ʿala l-nahari wayukawwiru l-nahara ʿala al-layli wasakhara l-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman ala huwa l-ʿazizu l-ghafaru

khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin thumma jaʿala min'ha zawjaha wa-anzala lakum mina l-anʿami thamaniyata azwajin yakhluqukum fi butuni ummahatikum khalqan min baʿdi khalqin fi zulumatin thalathin dhalikumu l-lahu rabbukum lahu l-mul'ku la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tus'rafuna

in takfuru fa-inna l-laha ghaniyyun ʿankum wala yarda liʿibadihi l-kuf'ra wa-in tashkuru yardahu lakum wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra thumma ila rabbikum marjiʿukum fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum taʿmaluna innahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
